step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide for the next step.
Excellent! You're maintaining good posture with your arm overhead. Focus on opening your hand and fingers wide as you prepare to make a fist.
Good job on the fist! Remember to inhale as you make your fist and tighten your muscles. Keep that arm extended overhead.
Nicely done! Exhale as you open your hand and relax. Visualize the fluid moving out of your arm. You're doing great with this repetition.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to stretch your arm straight overhead, feeling the resistance. Keep your palm and fingers open wide for the next movement.
Excellent form on this rep! Maintain that overhead stretch. Prepare to make a strong fist while inhaling.
Great fist! Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles. Keep your arm extended and focus on the fluid pumping action.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! Exhale as you relax your hand. You're effectively promoting lymph flow. Great effort!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Focus on making a tight fist while inhaling and opening your hand while exhaling to help move fluid.
